title: The Galactic Voyage
plot: A crew of explorers travel through a newly discovered wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

title: Hidden Recipes
plot: A young chef returns home to save the family restaurant and discovers a book of forgotten recipes.

title: Quantum Heist
plot: A team of thieves uses quantum tech to pull off a heist across different timelines.

title: City of Strings
plot: An aspiring violinist balances intense training with family expectations.

title: Pixel Rangers
plot: A group of kids are pulled into a retro video game world and must beat levels to return home.

title: Ocean Echoes
plot: Marine biologists document efforts to rebuild coral reefs.

title: Midnight Detectives
plot: Partners investigate a string of nighttime robberies linked to an art collective.

title: Hearts in Orbit
plot: Two engineers fall in love while repairing a failing orbital habitat.

title: Trailblazers
plot: A true story of a climber who leads an all-women expedition to a remote peak.

title: The Last Library
plot: A librarian discovers a doorway to a world where stories come alive.
